settings.text: Muir & Garrison Caps require head measurements. Text Box below, see measuring guide for details:

settings.custom_liquid:
<style>
  /* Style the textarea content */
  #head {
    font-weight: bold;
    color: black;
  }
  /* Style the placeholder text */
  #head::placeholder {
    font-weight: bold;
    color: black;
  }
</style>

<textarea id="head"
          placeholder="Head"
          name="properties[Head]"
          form="product-form-{{ section.id }}"
          maxlength="3"
          cols="3"
          rows="1"
          required>
</textarea>

settings.text: We will attempt to contact you if any measurements are missing. Otherwise the order may be refunded and cancelled.

settings.heading: Measurement Guide
settings.content:
Calfs must be measured at their widest to ensure accuracy.

Crotch is measured from top of waistband over the genitals to the taint.

Chest should be measured at nipple level.

Shoulders should be measured on back from where sleeves would attach.

Stomach at belly button level

Head measure the circumference of the head at forehead level

settings.title: Hassle-Free Exchanges
settings.text: Contact info@cockeyekink.com with your order number for returns/exchanges/modifications
